settings.hero_subtitle: Professional Sharp Shooter indicators for TradingView, battle-tested trading strategies, position management tools, and an active Discord community with dedicated support.

settings.title: Automated Trading Alerts
settings.description: Alerts are automatically triggered when strategy conditions are met and can send the signal directly to your broker or exchange in real-time.

settings.description: A trend-following algorithm with buy/sell signals, multiple filters, and position management tools to help optimize your trading strategy.

settings.description: An automated RSI-based trading system that generates buy/sell signals, multiple filters, and position management tools to help optimize your strategy.

settings.description: Battle-tested strategies on multiple asset classes and multiple time frames that are delivered to your TradingView account.

settings.title: Full Automation Package

settings.title: Sharp Shooter Candles
settings.description: Fully customizable strategy with intuitive color-coding. Green for bullish, red for bearish, orange for overbought, and blue for oversold conditions. Includes access to legacy v3.0.
settings.features:
✓ Buy/Sell Signals
✓ Noise Filter 
✓ Reversal Detection
✓ Time Filter
✓ Position Management Tools
✓ Trending Dots Filter
✓ Legacy v3.0 Access

settings.title: Sharp Shooter RSI
settings.description: Gain an edge with advanced RSI divergence detection. Identify trend changes before price action confirms them. Includes access to legacy v2.0.
settings.features:
✓ Buy/Sell Signals
✓ Noise Filter
✓ RSI Divergences
✓ Time Filter
✓ Position Management Tools
✓ Customizable Length & Style
✓ Legacy v2.0 Access
